Smart Hanger: A smart hanger that can detect the weight of the clothes and automatically adjust the temperature and humidity levels in the closet to create the perfect environment for storage. It can also track the wear and tear of the clothes and provide recommendations for when it's time to replace them. Confidence score: 0.8

Virtual Coat Hanger: A virtual reality app that allows users to try on different outfits virtually using a 3D avatar. It can also provide fashion advice and suggest new outfits based on the user's style and preferences. Confidence score: 0.9

Augmented Reality Coat Hanger: A coat hanger with an augmented reality display that shows users the latest fashion trends and styles. It can also provide recommendations for outfits based on the user's body shape and style. Confidence score: 0.8

Personalized Coat Hanger: A coat hanger that uses machine learning algorithms to learn the user's preferences and provide personalized recommendations for outfits and styling. It can also suggest accessories and shoes that match the user's style. Confidence score: 0.9

Smart Coat Rack: A coat rack with built-in sensors that can detect when a coat is taken off and automatically turn on the lights in the room to make it easier to find the coat later. It can also provide reminders for when it's time to clean the coat or when a new coat is needed. Confidence score: 0.8
